title: I Wasn’t Born Lucky - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Ghosts   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Obsessive Love   Overpowered Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Survival Game   Unlimited Flow
author: Danbai   蛋白
description:
'I wasn't born a lucky person, I’m just too strong.'

On his way home late in the evening, Xiao Li found a letter asking for help and inexplicably came to an unknown place. He had to finish the task given before he could succeed in returning to reality. In the legendary haunted school, Xiao Li looked at his companions' task of 'survive until dawn' and then looked at the tasks displayed in his book:

Tell me your name.

Tell me what you like.

Kiss me.

Xiao Li: ????

He was very confused and then refused.>
